about.title: About

contents.name: My History
contents.description: Hi, hola, My name is Mohd Rashid Ansari, I come from India, precisely in Lucknow, City in Sitapur. Now I am a front end developer in Wings To Grow company.

contents.name: What am i Doing
contents.description: I am currently focusing on learning front-end frameworks such as React and Next.js, alongside honing my backend skills, with a particular emphasis on mastering user-friendly technologies like Node.js and Express.js. Keeping pace with the latest technological advancements, I am dedicated to continuously expanding my knowledge and applying emerging concepts. Concurrently, I am actively crafting my portfolio through the development of personal projects, ensuring practical application of my evolving skill set.

contents.name: What Next
contents.description: My goal now is to master Front-End and Back-End technology. So that I can build a solution to an existing problem easily. Even though it is not easy and it takes a long time, I believe I can achieve it if I practice and learn continuously.

contents.name: Dreams and Wishes
contents.description: I aspire to join esteemed companies like Google or Microsoft, aiming for roles in software development engineering or front-end development. I am determined to persistently pursue these opportunities, continuously refining my skills and knowledge until I achieve success. and be an inspiration to others to become a good mentor to guide others to create a better future.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Explore my experiences, Rewards, and education, as well as my activeness

contents.name: Java Data Structures and Algorithms Masterclass
contents.description: Comprehensive masterclass on Java Data Structures and Algorithms: Learn, implement, and optimize key algorithms and data structures for efficient coding and problem-solving.

list.name: Master fundamental data structures and algorithms to enhance problem-solving skills and coding efficiency.
Develop proficiency in implementing complex algorithms and optimizing them for performance in Java.

contents.name: Become a Graphic Designer
contents.description: Learn essential design principles and tools to become a skilled Graphic Designer, creating impactful and visually appealing digital and print content.

list.name: Understand the core principles of graphic design, including color theory, typography, and composition, to create visually appealing designs.
Gain proficiency in popular design software such as Adobe Creative Suite to craft professional digital and print content.

contents.name: Data Analysis with R Programming
contents.description: Master data analysis and visualization with R programming to turn complex data into clear insights and make data-driven decisions.

list.name: Developed advanced skills in data analysis using R, including data wrangling, statistical modeling, and data visualization for impactful insights.

contents.name: Crash Course on Python
contents.description: Fast-paced introductory course by Google to learn Python programming fundamentals, enabling you to write basic scripts and solve real-world problems.

list.name: Developed strong foundational skills in Python programming, including data types, control structures, and functions to build efficient scripts.

contents.name: Graphic Era University
contents.description: I hold a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering From Graphic Era University, where I focused on coursework covering Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, and Object-Oriented Programming. Proficient in Python, C++, and JavaScript, I am equipped to excel in software development roles.
